product_name: Oboz Mystic Low Waterproof Hiking Shoes - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: With rugged outsoles and athletic, low-cut design, the waterproof Oboz Mystic Low Hiking Shoes for women deliver comfort and coverage on wet, muddy trails. Waterproof leather and suede uppers feature abrasion-resistant nylon mesh panels for just the right combination of protection and breathability. Waterproof, breathable membrane keeps feet protected without causing them to overheat. Molded EVA footbeds and dual-density EVA midsoles provide cushioning. Nylon shanks offer torsional stability and protection underfoot, ensuring a smooth stride and reducing rock bruising. Oboz Mystic Low Hiking Shoes have aggressively lugged outsoles with durable, sticky rubber for exceptional grip in all directions, on both wet and dry surfaces. Closeout.
short_description: With rugged outsoles and athletic, low-cut design, the waterproof Oboz Mystic Low Hiking Shoes for women deliver comfort and coverage on wet, muddy trails.
